example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2AvailabilityZone
Messages RegionName State ZoneName -------- ---------- ----- -------- {} us-west-2 available us-west-2a {} us-west-2 available us-west-2b {} us-west-2 available us-west-2c
example.description: This example describes the Availability Zones for the current region that are available to you.
This example describes any Availability Zones that are in an impaired state. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or higher.

example.code:
PS C:\> $filter = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\> $filter.Name = "state" PS C:\> $filter.Values = "impaired"
PS C:\>Get-EC2AvailabilityZone -Filter $filter
example.description: With PowerShell version 2, you must use New-Object to create the filter.
